backend/main.mo: Defines the actor with storage and authorization mixins plus all domain types for schools, staff, payments, packing, training, and outstanding amounts.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark design tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up QueryClient, router, theme provider, and global Toaster for the React app.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoDataUna: Renders an alert shown when demo mode lacks required data.
frontend/src/components/demo/DemoPreview: Displays a demo-mode banner with a role switcher that triggers navigation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout handling identity, demo mode, header, navigation, and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/RoleNav.t: Role-based navigation menu rendering links and icons with active-state styling, updating when the user role changes.
frontend/src/components/schools/SchoolSe: Searchable school list panel with filtering, loading skeletons, and context-specific action links.
frontend/src/demo/demoDataStore.ts: LocalStorage-backed demo data store handling schools, outstanding amounts, and packing status with bigint serialization.
frontend/src/demo/demoGuards.ts: Utility functions to disable mutations and provide messages when demo mode is active.
frontend/src/demo/demoProfile.ts: Generates synthetic user profiles per staff role for demo mode without backend calls.
frontend/src/demo/demoRoutes.ts: Maps staff roles to their dashboard routes and exposes a helper to retrieve them.
frontend/src/demo/demoSession.ts: Manages demo mode sessions in localStorage, including credentials, activation, and role persistence.
frontend/src/demo/useDemoPreview.ts: Hook exposing demo mode state and providing methods to set roles or exit demo mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout helpers, and identity persistence using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, schools, payments, and other backend data with demo-mode fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/academic/AcademicQuer: Displays academic queries with filtering and provides a dialog to submit responses.
frontend/src/pages/accounts/SchoolPaymen: Manages school payment records, including creation, editing, and uploading payment proofs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Shows filterable audit logs, with demo-mode handling and search functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OutstandingAmou: Provides UI to search schools, view current outstanding amount, and update it using related queries and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StaffManagement: Manages staff profiles including listing, creating, editing, and repairing permissions with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AcademicDa: Displays counts of open and resolved academic queries with navigation to the full queries list.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AccountsDa: Shows total schools and provides a school search panel for accounts-related operations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin overview showing totals for schools, staff, and activities plus recent audit logs and quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MarketingD: Displays total schools and provides tools for searching and registering schools for marketing workflows.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PackingDas: Shows total schools and offers navigation for searching schools and managing packing operations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/TrainingDa: Summarizes total schools and open academic queries and includes a school search panel tailored for training tasks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements login flow for Internet Identity and demo mode, including redirects based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/marketing/SchoolCreat: Form page to register a new school and navigate based on user role after creation.
frontend/src/pages/packing/packingOption: Defines available packing classes and themes as constant option lists.
frontend/src/pages/packing/PackingSchool: Lists all schools with search and lets users select one to manage packing.
frontend/src/pages/packing/SchoolPacking: Manages packing status and counts for a specific school, including class/theme selection.
frontend/src/pages/schools/SchoolDetails: Displays and allows editing of a schoolâ€™s details with outstanding amount info.
frontend/src/pages/training/SchoolTraini: Logs and displays training visits for a school, including file upload for proof.
frontend/src/pages/training/TrainingQuer: Shows all academic queries raised by the user with status and responses.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's route structure with authentication, demo-mode handling, and role-based redirects to various dashboards and pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage-backed values and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS themes, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's architecture, requirements, current issues, and feature set for a role-based internal school management app.
